ingredients.name: Chicken Breast
ingredients.notes: cut in half and pounded thin

steps.text: Combine flour and essence in bowl. Dredge chicken in flour mixture, shake off excess.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat until very hot but not smoking.
Add 1 Tbsp of the butter and cook chicken until golden on both sides, about 3 minutes per side. Set aside.
Add 1 Tbsp of the butter to pan and add the mushrooms. Cook until mushrooms are golden brown and have given off their liquid, stirring frequently.
Add Marsala, bring to a boil, scrape to remove browned bits from bottom of pan.
When reduced by half, add chicken stock then cook for 3 minutes or until sauce is thickened slightly.
Lower to medium heat and return chicken to pan.
Cook until they are cooked through and sauce has thickened, about 5-6 minutes.
Swirl in remaining butter and add salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with chopped chives.
